resources.string: Tricks specific to the fingerprint scanner
Customize the carrier label on the lockscreen or statusbar
Configure the visibility of statusbar items
Configure the layout of the quick settings area
Enable and configure the traffic indicators
Enable the statusbar ticker and configure ticker related tricks
Enables the advanced restart menu for other restarting options
Disable power menu on secure lockscreen
Display power menu on a secured lockscreen
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Long press volume buttons to switch tracks while screen off
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
Customize screenshot attributes like time, delay,type etc
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Double tap on the top third or bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Enable the running services icon in the footer
Display the app\'s icon corresponding with the toast
Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Hide and show clock at regular intervals of time
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Place indicator in either status bar or expanded header
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen date widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen owner info
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Disable heads up in these applications
Disable heads up for these applications
Vibrate when QS tiles are pressed
Vibrate when fingerprint authentication is successful
Show media cover art as the lockscreen background
Toggle battery location for QS header
Show visualizer bars while playing music
Use a preset color instead of the generated color
Use a smooth lava lamp style color blend animation
Toggle the visibility of icons in statusbar
Configure notification light on per-app basis
Blink LED for battery in Do Not Disturb mode
Blink LED when battery level is low
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Show battery level for the currently connected BT headset, if available.
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Show heads up only for dialer app and disable all others
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Display the roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Active volume stream will be displayed on the screen even if disabled here. Volume streams enabled here would be displayed forcefully.
Set custom volume steps for sounds
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
When Gaming mode is turned on, HW buttons will be locked
Block all headsup notifications except calls & alarms
Block all headsup notifications except alarms
Block all headsup notifications except calls
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Block notifications sound & vibration when Gaming mode is turned on
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
Play sound and vibrate for notifications when screen is on
Show Corvus logo in the status bar
Use a custom image for QS header
Select an image from pre-installed image collections
Select an image from internal storage
Show estimated remaining battery life next to the icon
Show mobile type icon on top of the signal indicator
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Sets edge light color to the primary color of wallpaper
Set max repeat count. 0 for infinite
Shows the visualization bars also on ambient display (but less opaque)
Double tap power to toggle torch
Long press power to toggle torch
Show a dialog when an application crashes
Blink flashlight only in ringer mode
Blink flashlight only in DND mode
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Display Settings icon in quick settings footer
Display Multi-user switcher icon in quick settings footer
Display the tile edit icon in quick settings footer
These are power saving features. They may interfere with services intended to run at idle, like navigation apps. You can whitelist these apps from being affected in the app battery settings.
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
Show buttons beside the brightness slider to adjust brightness
Display text at bottom of QS panel
Hide the lock icon on lockscreen
blurs darkened background behind quick settings
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
Icons/colors may vary depending on which device you are using.
Shows an animation while reading your finger
Customize the layout of the navigation bar
Display left and right cursor buttons in navigation bar while typing
Swap the order of recents and back buttons
Customize gestures and set custom actions
To choose a specific app activity for the action, long press on any app in the app picker.\n\nIf launcher is showing, do the swipe at the very bottom area of the screen to trigger the action.
Trigger action on wider swipe (more than half of display size), or a L swipe (vertically longer enough)
Enable backlight with timeout only on button touch
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Disable expanding quick settings on secure lock screens
Disable the new access restrictions for device identifiers
Use the device hardware keys for navigation
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Display a fancy animation when the device is charging
Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket
Show OOS clear all notifications button in quick settings instead of default text one
Use default statusbar height in Hide
They really cut corners with this one
Show media heads up when a new track is played, if the player is not already in foreground
Hide smart replies to save screen space with peeking notifications
Force apps to ignore notch space
Please restart the application to apply the changes.
Show data usage in qs header
Shows data usage in quick settings header of sim used for data
Launch music app on headset connection
Launch the default music app when headset is connected
